segments.text: I see the woman, lost in her world, polishing that plate like it’s the only thing that matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The chaos is right in front of her, yet she’s completely blind to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel tension building inside me as I watch the boy’s daring climb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His excitement over the cookie jar is infectious, but I can’t ignore the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl’s anticipation, her arm raised, almost like she’s hypnotized by the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such a sweet moment, yet it feels like a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I only hope that the woman wakes up to the reality of what's unfolding just in time.
segments.speaker: PAR
